rows.label: qst102714_msg0052
rows.name:
I can feel myself getting
weaker by the day...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0053
rows.name:
It might be the effect
of Marveni's death...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0054
rows.name:
I wonder if I'll be able
to finish writing Vandham's
story to the end...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0055
rows.name:
Um, everyone brought some
medicine for you, Grandpa.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0056
rows.name:
And Hikari-chan said she'll regulate
your ether flow for you...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0057
rows.name:
Are you ready, Minochi? Once you
drink the medicine, I'll begin.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0058
rows.name:
Hikari... I see. So the
time has finally come...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0102
rows.name:
My body feels warm... and it
seems easier to breathe.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0105
rows.name:
Though I can never escape
the fate of death...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0106
rows.name:
I will endure until the day my
unfinished work is performed.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0107
rows.name:
And besides... you all are
essential to Vandham's story.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0108
rows.name:
I must see how your
purpose is fulfilled.

rows.label: qst102714_msg0109
rows.name:
It's not much of a reward,
but please take this...

rows.label: qst102714_msg0110
rows.name:
I could never master it,
but perhaps you can.
